tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: At this moment, the error doesn't affect us, because the first 19 days of the data set correspond to an uptrend! However...

paragraphs.text: ... it would affect us if we were working with uptrends!
The troubleshooting process we just went through may come naturally to you if you are a developer. If you are not, you must become familiar with it, because you will certainly need to use it.
Trading automation requires many pieces of information to fit together like in a Swiss watch. You will make errors building strats. Deal with 'em!
